item.title: MIUI V12.0.2.0.QJSEUXM Fastboot update for Mi 10T Lite EEA
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi 10T Lite EEA

Codename: gauguin

Version: V12.0.2.0.QJSEUXM | 10.0

Size: 4.3 GB

MD5: 3a1ecb7d637b520b62fb645e5e3012fd

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: System lag occurred when camera was being used for a long time
Fix: System froze in rare cases. Improved the overall stability.
[Camera]
Optimization: Image quality for low-light and ultra-wide shots
[Other improvements and optimizations]
Optimization: HDR effect

Download: Here
